Control Statement: The organization: a. Provides the capability of shutting off power to the information system or individual system components in emergency situations;b. Places emergency shutoff switches or devices in [Assignment: organization-defined location by information system or system component] to facilitate safe and easy access for personnel; andc. Protects emergency power shutoff capability from unauthorized activation.
